programme.desc: The world of Dahuang was once divided into three kingdoms: Xiyan, Chenrong, and Haoling. Xiyan and Chenrong were at war, and General Chi Chen led the forces of Chenrong. At the last minute, the daughter of Xiyan's Emperor was called on to lead Xiyan's forces as the General Princess. She defeated General Chi Chen at the cost of her own life, and succeeded in turning the tide of the war. Chenrong lost its momentum and was conquered by Xiyan.

programme.title: Heart Warmers - EP 6
programme.desc: Jabez Koh is the director of a transportation company where almost all the workers have a criminal record. He is unfazed by their past, as he himself has served a sentence of 16 years. However, for some tattooed ex-offenders, social re-integration is plainly harder to achieve. The cost of tattoo removal can be prohibitive so an aesthetic doctor decides to do something about the situation.

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine - EP 12
programme.desc: Using the local society issues as a backbone, this drama depicts the lives of families of different background residing in the same neighbourhood, from the cold and self-centered to the understanding of the true meaning of love. programme.desc: Juli (Nabila Zavira) and Romi (Naufal Samudra) fight over a motorcycle taxi to get to the office, which turns out they work in the same office. Juli works as a security guard, while Romi works as a cleaning service. But the more often they meet, the more often Juli and Romi fight.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 331
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. programme.title: Movie - Zombie
programme.desc: Tired of their day-to-day lives, three friends decide to go on a vacation where they encounter zombies and meet a girl while running for their lives.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Kalluriyin Kadhai
programme.desc: After graduating, a young man and a girl, who are in love with each other, promise to meet again after five years in their college campus. When he does show up on the set day, his friends are shocked to see that he has completely changed.

programme.title: Movie - Sivanda Kangal
programme.desc: An honest police officer bravely fights against industrialists who commit various atrocities. Even after resigning, he takes on the notorious businessman Chakravarty.

programme.title: Movie - MGR Nagaril
programme.desc: Four men try to impress a young woman who is investigating her brother's murder. However, when they pretend to be the dead man's friends, they get into deep trouble.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sinam
programme.desc: Danny, who works in a bar in Thailand, often dreams about the murder of three people, which include a businessman, an air hostess and a politician. He decides to unravel the mystery behind his dreams.

programme.title: Movie - Coimbatore Mappillai
programme.desc: Balu comes to the city for better opportunities and stays with his friend. He falls in love with Sumithra, his landlord, but her evil cousin Mahesh creates a rift between them.

programme.title: Movie - Makkal Veeran
programme.desc: Ganga, a camerawoman, helps Rambabu, a fiery mechanic, to become a journalist. When an evil politician Ranababu kills reputed journalist Surya, Rambabu decides to destroy his political career.

programme.title: Movie - Sippikkul Muthu
programme.desc: Sivayya, a person with autism, lives in a village with his grandmother. Things take a turn when he marries a widow, Lalitha, in order to save her from the atrocities of widowhood.

programme.title: Movie - Satyam
programme.desc: Sathyam, a cop, doesn't believe in finishing criminals in fake encounters but in a judicial way. A powerful politician hires an assassin to get rid of his competitors. Sathyam is assigned to the case.

programme.title: Movie - Shock
programme.desc: Vasanth, a stock analyst, buys a flat in a high-rise building. After knowing that a woman committed suicide in the apartment, his wife Malini begins to behave in a peculiar manner.

programme.title: Movie - Then Paandi Cheemayile
programme.desc: An archaeologist learns about a village that is under the reign of three brothers. He decides to destroy their power and end their influence on the villagers.

programme.title: Movie - Veeran Veluthambi
programme.desc: Veeran Veluthambi is a 1987 Tamil-language action film directed by Rama Narayanan, starring Vijayakanth and Radha Ravi.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Idhaya Vaasal
programme.desc: Aravind's father allows him to choose his future wife, soon after which he falls for Vaani. But problems arise when her parents disapprove of their relationship and Aravind chases them for their consent.

programme.title: Movie - Annan Ennada Thambi Ennada
programme.desc: A man continually disrespects women, much to the annoyance of his brother. Frustrated by his behaviour, his brother decides to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Movie - Lovely
programme.desc: Mahadevan hates the word love. His daughter Nivedha, however, loves Chandru, son of her father's business partner. Thus begins a fun-filled attempt by Chandru to try and impress Mahadevan.

programme.title: Movie - Ponmanam
programme.desc: An unemployed Anandhan's family has no expectations from him. However, when his parents commit suicide after his sister elopes, he is determined to find her.

programme.title: Movie - Kabali
programme.desc: Kabali fights against the oppression faced by the Tamils working in Malaysia as labourers. However, he is jailed for 25 years and once released, he sets out to seek his revenge.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: 126 riders from 21 teams will compete for the yellow jersey of the 46th Tour de Hongrie. Six WorldTeams, nine ProTeams, five Continental Teams and one Cyclo-Cross ProTeam will compete in the centenary event. It was the eleventh edition since the race's revival in 2015, and was rated as a 2.Pro-category event as part of the 2025 UCI ProSeries.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group F: Netherlands vs Great Britain
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025 :R2-22 (Mark Williams vs Hossein Vafaei)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: Women’s tennis has been a mainstay of Eastbourne since 1974’s inaugural Eastbourne Open. The tournament is played on outdoor grass courts, and is generally considered a "warm-up" for the Wimbledon Championships. Some of the world's finest female tennis talent will head to Devonshire Park to compete for the prize purse of USD$142,000. Martina Navratilova holds the record for the most singles titles with 11

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Asian Tour 2025
programme.desc: International Series Morocco is the fourth of 10 elevated events on the 2025 Asian Tour calendar. The $2m tournament will take place at the Royal Golf Dar Es Salam - Red Course in Rabat. Ideally located in the heart of a cork oak forest, the Royal Golf Dar Es Salam is a marvel of its kind: technicality, quality of courses, greens and beauty of a sublime landscape.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Open de Rouen is a professional women's tennis tournament which was introduced in 2022 and is part of the WTA Tour. The tournament is staged at the Kindarena in the city of Rouen in France. It is played indoors on clay and 32 players will battle it out for the prize money of USD$$275,094.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: We explore Arsene Wenger's managerial journey before joining Arsenal, tracing his evolution from a young, innovative coach in France to a transformative force in European football. Delving into his time at Nancy, AS Monaco and Nagoya Grampus Eight, Wenger's tactical brilliance began to shape his future success. We highlight the key moments that led him to one of football's most iconic roles.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 16
programme.desc: Once part of a dominant Manchester United side in the 1990s, Peter Schmeichel is one of the Premier League's most decorated goalkeepers. The Dane looks back at some of the memorable moments from his remarkable career, including a famous victory over his beloved United when he was Number 1 for their bitter city rivals.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: We explore Arsene Wenger's managerial journey before joining Arsenal, tracing his evolution from a young, innovative coach in France to a transformative force in European football. Delving into his time at Nancy, AS Monaco and Nagoya Grampus Eight, Wenger's tactical brilliance began to shape his future success. We highlight the key moments that led him to one of football's most iconic roles.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.desc: Arguably the best player in his position in world football right now, Rodri has honed his talents on the pitch to help Manchester City achieve a record 4 Premier League titles in a row. In this week's Big Interview, former Chelsea and City playmaker, Frank Lampard talks to Rodri about the intricacies of his game. From positioning, breaking up play to how he's developed his role, this midfield masterclass will reveal all about his game.

programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2014/2015 season.

programme.title: FS MMA Jake Shields vs. Ray Steinbeiss
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! In sunny Costa Rica, Jake Shields takes on Ray "Ipswich Cobra" Steinbeiss in a technical chess match that spells victory for only one man.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Erik Morales vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is an interim WBA light welterweight title fight between Erik Morales and Marcos Maidana that gave Maidana a chance to leap back into the boxing title scene, while Morales provided fans with a vintage performance. Also on the card, action from WBO welterweight champ Carlos Quintanta.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Terunofuji, Asanoyama, Takayasu and Wakatakakage.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: WCCB Emmanuel Rodriguez vs. Melvin Lopez
programme.desc: From the MGM National Harbor in Oxon Hill, Maryland, a main event showdown between two of the world's top bantamweights, Emmanuel Rodriguez and Melvin Lopez, will decide the IBF Bantamweight World Champion. Rodriguez (21-2) is a former world champion, enters the bout off a victory over undefeated Gary Antonio Russell, and now sits at #2 in the world rankings according to the IBF.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Competitors head to the Midwest to try and qualify for a shot at the American Ninja Warrior title. Can the athletes handle two new obstacles including a rope swing and double tilt ladder?

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Meisei, Tsurugisho, Kotonowaka and Tobizaru.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, in one of his toughest fights yet, challenging Miguel Cotto for the WBA super light middleweight title, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

Episode 3, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Meisei, Tsurugisho, Kotonowaka and Tobizaru.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, in one of his toughest fights yet, challenging Miguel Cotto for the WBA super light middleweight title, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: WCCB Emmanuel Rodriguez vs. Melvin Lopez
programme.desc: From the MGM National Harbor in Oxon Hill, Maryland, a main event showdown between two of the world's top bantamweights, Emmanuel Rodriguez and Melvin Lopez, will decide the IBF Bantamweight World Champion. Rodriguez (21-2) is a former world champion, enters the bout off a victory over undefeated Gary Antonio Russell, and now sits at #2 in the world rankings according to the IBF.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Competitors head to the Midwest to try and qualify for a shot at the American Ninja Warrior title. Can the athletes handle two new obstacles including a rope swing and double tilt ladder?

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander

This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Wide World of Fights Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuna who is missing her magic flute.

programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. A noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 - EP 117

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 - EP 118
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 245
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig's boat for a day on the river. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 246
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch.

programme.desc: Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.desc: Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoe Zebra's house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 252
programme.desc: It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George go outside to look at the stars.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 104

programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffle. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 - EP 309

programme.desc: To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 - EP 218
programme.desc: While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety. It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 - EP 125

programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 5

programme.desc: Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song "just for them", leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 19

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 29

The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 131
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 91
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: I Was Actually There S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: A massive earthquake below the Indian Ocean unleashed the deadliest tsunami in history, killing 230,000 people. Those who were swept up in the wave had no idea of its scale, only of the devastation that unfolded before them.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Young professionals Stuart and Monique Cormack are desperate to reinvent their tiny, neglected backyard. Will their big dreams fit their pint-sized, terrace garden?

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 22
programme.desc: We examine the chaos, confusion, uncertainty and fear generated by Trump's so-called reciprocal tariffs, which experts say will increase the cost of living, make the US poorer and the world a less prosperous and secure place.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 21
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch (2025) - EP 17
programme.desc: Bridget, James, Emma and the team chat with Killing Heidi's Ella and Jesse Hooper, world-renowned pianist Lang Lang, Movie news from Zak Hepburn plus pastry chef Christy Tania and winter tray bake ideas from Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 103
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 132
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 132
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 132
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 62
programme.desc: Adam and his guests, performer Michelle Law and philanthropist Kon Karapanagiotidis, pay tribute to the recipes they've made their own.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 34
programme.desc: Under the world's oldest picture garden in Broome, WA, sits a jila, or waterhole.Yawuru man Jimmy Edgar remembers the dream time stories of this important meeting place for people from many cultures over thousands of years.

programme.title: Project Wild S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time she visits biodiversity-rich Cambodia.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: In nature, being flamboyant can mean anything form using extravagant behaviour to entice a mate or warn off predators - to camouflaging yourself when hunting. Standing out can be the ultimate strategy for survival.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo S4 - EP 5
programme.desc: Ernie experiences the breathtaking Bungle Bungles in the heart of the Kimberley, Narelda visits Coranderrk with a Wurundjeri elder and Aaron steps into the studio with didge-legend Dave Hudson.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: ABC News Regional (2025) - EP 23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 114
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien (2025) - EP 114
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 62
programme.desc: Adam and his guests, performer Michelle Law and philanthropist Kon Karapanagiotidis, pay tribute to the recipes they've made their own.

programme.title: Heywire (2022) - EP 1
programme.desc: Once a year, Heywire winner Jack comes together with his Italian family to make Nona's famous tomato sauce.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: In nature, being flamboyant can mean anything form using extravagant behaviour to entice a mate or warn off predators - to camouflaging yourself when hunting. Standing out can be the ultimate strategy for survival.

programme.title: If You're Listening (2025) - EP 20
programme.desc: Historically, Defence spending is used to protect your country from big threats: ships on the horizon, submarine warfare, stealth bombers. But drone attacks which are pretty cheap and incredibly effective are changing that.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season (2025) - EP 101
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 104

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Negeri 5 Menara
programme.desc: Six best friends in the Islamic Boarding School often hang out near the mosque towers. All of them made a promise under the tower that one day, they will go to places that they have been dreaming about.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S3
programme.desc: Fly to the very best luxury resort in your own private jet, take a spin in an exotic supercar, get your hands on the most expensive designer jewellery money can buy, and then spend the night in one of Asia's top presidential suites!

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S2
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour S2
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host._x000D_The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining.

programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Go Go Sister - EP 3
programme.desc: We search for the best ingredients from all over the world, use the skills of Michelin star chefs to make delicious and touching dishes, and deliver them warmly to your home.

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1468
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 532
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 296
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1737
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: Eat,Play,Love - EP 9
programme.desc: We invite you to eat all over Taiwan, let the "cuisine" move you and me, and make "travel" more meaningful.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1067
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 26
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 9
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 40
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Unexpected Marriage - EP 1
programme.desc: Princess Liu Chang Sheng of the Fu Yu Kingdom, faces obstacles in finding a spouse. The Emperor sends her to marry the ruthless Prince Li Jing of the Da Tang Kingdom. They embark on a comical journey to ultimately discover the true meaning of love.

programme.title: The Unexpected Marriage - EP 2
programme.desc: Princess Liu Chang Sheng of the Fu Yu Kingdom, faces obstacles in finding a spouse. The Emperor sends her to marry the ruthless Prince Li Jing of the Da Tang Kingdom. They embark on a comical journey to ultimately discover the true meaning of love.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 8
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 2
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 3
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 14
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 14
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 15
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 9
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 3
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 19
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 4
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 19
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: The Death Curse
programme.desc: The medical scientist Tin distributes his inheritance among his eight children from different wives before he dies. Under the supervision of Lawyer Cheung, the eight siblings must gather and pray in their father's old haunted mansion every midnight, otherwise they will lose their right of inheritance.

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangster's son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Troublesome Night 4
programme.desc: This horror comedy consists of four short stories about a group of Hong Kong tourists who travel to the Philippines and encounter a series of paranormal events.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Expect The Unexpected
programme.desc: As the OCB team tracks down three amateur thieves who robbed a jewellery store, they encounter the wanted ferocious gangsters and hunt both down at the same time. The team celebrates their success when the gangsters are caught in a fierce battle, but it is at this time that the amateur thieves on the run show up and something unexpected happens...

programme.title: Forest of Death
programme.desc: This movie is adapted from a Japanese legend. A group of young people come together for a special investigation on the mysterious signals transmitted from the forest that would lure people in to commit suicide.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents' wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin's husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: Set in the Tang Dynasty, the 13 adopted sons of Sha Tuo King are all renowned as royal warriors. David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.
